summary: 2002 MALIBU.  ROTORS AND PADS HAVE HAD TO BE REPLACED 3 TIMES AND PADS ALONE ONCE IN 35000 MILES.  CHEVROLET CUSTOMER ASSISTANCE SAYS THERE IS NOTHING WRONG WITH THE CAR.  3 DIFFERENT SERVICE DEPARTMENTS HAVE TOLD ME THAT THIS IS A COMMON PROBLEM WITH MALIBU'S AND GRAND AM'S.  BRAKES WILL BE COMPLETELY REDESIGNED FOR 2004.  WHY REDESIGN IF THERE IS NO PROBLEM??  *JB
